text: Craig Mod talks with Jan Chipchase about his research book: <https://craigmod.com/onmargins/001/>

attachments.title: The years-long road to the Field Study Handbook
attachments.text: Researcher and author Jan Chipchase has a new book — "The Field Study Handbook." We discuss how he came to produce this 500+ page magnum opus — a distillation of his life's work — and why he is self publishing.
attachments.fallback: On Margins: The years-long road to the Field Study Handbook

text:
"A study found 'negative perceptions' of Uber tripled, to 27%, in the wake of the company's scandals last winter and this spring (link). 'Still, the share of users who had actually switched ride-hailing apps thus far was relatively low — about 4% — according to the study.' Via Washington Post / CG42."

<https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/dr-gridlock/wp/2017/05/16/deleteuber-will-have-lasting-fallout-for-ride-hailing-app-study-says/>

attachments.title: #DeleteUber will have lasting fallout for ride-hailing app, study says
attachments.text: A N.Y. consulting firm reports that repeated scandals have hurt the company.
attachments.fallback: Washington Post: #DeleteUber will have lasting fallout for ride-hailing app, study says
